Interface GRADSIntf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GRADS

    public interface GRADSIntf
    Your implementation of this interface must be named GRADS

    • Method Detail

      • setUser

        void setUser(java.lang.String userId)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the user id (X500) of the user currently using the system.
        Parameters:
        userId - the X500 id of the user generating progress summaries.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the user id is invalid. SEE NOTE IN CLASS HEADER.

      • getUser

        java.lang.String getUser()
        Gets the user id of the user currently using the system.
        Returns:
        the X500 user id of the user currently using the system.

      • getStudentIDs

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStudentIDs()
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets a list of the userIds of the students that a GPC can view.
        Returns:
        a list containing the userId of for each student in the system belonging to the current user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - is the current user is not a GPC.

      • getTranscript

        StudentRecord getTranscript(java.lang.String userId)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the raw student record data for a given userId.
        Parameters:
        userId - the identifier of the student.
        Returns:
        the student record data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the form data could not be retrieved. SEE NOTE IN CLASS HEADER.

      • updateTranscript

        void updateTranscript(java.lang.String userId,
                    StudentRecord transcript)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves a new set of student data to the records data.
        Parameters:
        userId - the student ID to overwrite.
        transcript - the new student record
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the transcript data could not be saved, failed a validity check, or a non-GPC tries to call. SEE NOTE IN CLASS HEADER.

      • addNote

        void addNote(java.lang.String userId,
           java.lang.String note)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Appends a note to a student record.
        Parameters:
        userId - the student ID to add a note to.
        note - the note to append
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the note could not be saved or a non-GPC tries to call. SEE NOTE IN CLASS HEADER.

      • generateProgressSummary

        ProgressSummary generateProgressSummary(java.lang.String userId)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates progress summary
        Parameters:
        userId - the student to generate the record for.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the progress summary could not be generated. SEE NOTE IN CLASS HEADER.

      • simulateCourses

        ProgressSummary simulateCourses(java.lang.String userId,
                              java.util.List<CourseTaken> courses)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates a new progress summary, assuming that the student passes the provided set of prospective courses.
        Parameters:
        userId - the student to generate the record for.
        courses - a list of the prospective courses.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the progress summary could not be generated or the courses are invalid. SEE NOTE IN CLASS HEADER.
